```
Rsymmetric(Q::QDHT)
```

`symmetric(A, Q::QDHT)`に合わせて放射座標配列を作成します。

# 例

```jldoctest
julia> q = QDHT{0, 1}(10, 4);
julia> q.r
4-element Array{Float64,1}:
 1.6106347946239767
 3.697078919099734
 5.795844623798052
 7.8973942990196395
julia> Rsymmetric(q)
9-element Array{Float64,1}:
 -7.8973942990196395
 -5.795844623798052
 -3.697078919099734
 -1.6106347946239767
  0.0
  1.6106347946239767
  3.697078919099734
  5.795844623798052
  7.8973942990196395
```
